name: Mafia II

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/gta-vc.exe

content:
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/gta-vc.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 640x480
